Description: Name of burn unit (i.e., Angel, 25 Mile, Sherman Creek, Chumstick ZUI, Paradise 90, Orion 2)
Plot number (i.e., 1-20) of nearest overstory permanent plot
Direction at which surrogate pin plot was placed at each plot. 4 locations at each plot (i.e., N, E, S, W).
Distance, in mm, from the highest point of the surface material (SM) to the boundary of SM and Duff.
ID or type of SM that is dominant at each pin (i.e., "LP" (long needle pine), "SF" (spruce-fir-hemlock)).
Distance, in mm, from the highest point of the duff (SM/Duff boundary) to the boundary of soil and Duff.
ID or type of Duff that is dominant at each pin (i.e., "LP" (long needle pine), "SF" (spruce-fir-hemlock)).
ID of parent material beneath the horizons of organic matter at each surrogate pin location (i.e., "mineral soil", "rock", "log").
